inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, gradual enlargement of hands and feet, irregular menstrual cycle, nipple discharge, positive history for snoring and headache, subtle facial features of acromegaly and prognathism, normal visual fields by confrontation, hirsutism, soft tissue thickening and diaphoresis of hands and feet, IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL and random GH of 19.7 ng/mL, MRI reveals a macroadenoma with no invasion, stable doses of octreotide LAR since diagnosis was confirmed.
